articles.description: IOC Share Price Target 2024, Rs 7 DIVIDEND: The record date for the state-owned Indian Oil Corporation's (IOC) Rs 7 per share dividend is approaching near. Should you buy the stock? Check IOC share price target by Motilal Oswal.
articles.content: IOC Share Price Target 2024, Rs 7 DIVIDEND: From June 14's closing price of Rs 170.36, Motilal Oswal's target represents a potential upside of up to 14.46 per cent. (Image: iStock/ET NOW News)

articles.description: GPES Solar IPO GMP Price Today: GPES Solar Limited's shares are proposed to be listed on both the leading exchanges -- NSE and BSE. The listing will likely take place on June 24.
